__TOC__

The Product Strategy QA team is focused on quality and quality related process within Canonical Department called Product Strategy. Product Strategy is behind stuff like Unity (2D and 3D) or Ubuntu TV.

==== What kinds of things does the Product Strategy QA team do? ====
* <<TODO>>

==== Who we are ====
Currently we are a group of QA engineers working on testability of the code we (as a broader group) develop, writing infrastructure/test harnesses for automated testing as well as test automation. Our goal is to follow best engineering practices (such as Test Driven Development) and evangelize them within our engineering group.

==== Meetings ====

The PS QA team has regular meetings on last Tuesday in the month at 15:30 UTC in '''#ubuntu-meeting''' on irc.freenode.net . See agenda and archive at <nowiki>[[Meetings]]</nowiki>
